title: [B1] LF mature/non-ragey dynamic queue partners (ADC/Top)
body:
Just looking for some decent players to improve with. No rage, no flame, just play and improve. 

Sometimes you straight up lose games because of feeders/trolls but that shouldn't stop you from improving your own game.

If you think like I do, then add me IGN: Musicas. Also any plat+ ADC mentors welcome to add me and give me tips :)

Thanks

replies.body: I'll add you tomorrow or you can add me, My main is s5 currently and i main support - top - mid.

Ok I'll add you ...
I'm b1 as well main support jg and mid
